data.name: World of Tanks — Blistering Firebrand Pack
data.detailed_description:
Whether you are a beginner or an experienced tanker, this tank will provide lots of fun for everyone. Coming with the Blistering Firebrand DLC, the Tetrarch is a Tier II Soviet light tank boasting a very high top speed and excellent maneuverability, as well as a powerful gun and amazing penetration values.

Firepower. The Tetrarch may be small, but it bites hard! It has a potent 2-pounder gun that can easily punch through the armor of your opponents. The basic AP round can pierce 64 mm of steel on average, and the special APCR round can pierce 121 mm, which is absolutely insane for a Tier II tank!

Speed. Good luck trying to catch this bad boy on the battlefield—at 64 km/h, its top speed is the third best at its tier. Adding great maneuverability and the small size of the vehicle, we get a furious little monster ready to blast your enemies to pieces.

Protection. This is what you should be most concerned about when playing the Tetrarch, as it has very thin armor and a small HP pool, making it easy prey for your opponents—but only if they manage to get you in their sights!

Use your excellent speed and small profile to successfully evade enemy shells and launch devastating surprise attacks on the flanks, or help your teammates by being an effective support damage dealer on the second line.

Also in the package:

  • Garage slot
  • 100% crew (commander with Sixth Sense)
  • 3 days of WoT Premium Account

DLC can be added to your World of Tanks account only once.
You will be able to use this DLC only if you play from the game account created on Steam.

Coming with the Blistering Firebrand DLC, the Tetrarch is a Tier II Soviet light tank boasting a very high top speed, as well as a powerful gun and amazing penetration values.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian, German*, Czech*, Dutch, Finnish, Hungarian, Japanese*, Korean*, Polish*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Romanian, Russian*, Spanish - Latin America*, Swedish, Turkish*, Ukrainian*, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: A processor with at least two physical cores supporting SSE2
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8600, ATI Radeon HD 4550
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 57 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 – 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 (Desktop)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX660 (2GB) / Radeon HD 7850 (2GB)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 57 GB available space
